mapper.sql: id, userid, province, city, street, fulladdress, name, telphone
mapper.insert: insert into wh_shipping_address (id, userid, province, city, street, fulladdress, name, telphone) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fulladdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telphone,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update wh_shipping_address
userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
street = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
fulladdress = #{fulladdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update wh_shipping_address set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, street = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fulladdress = #{fulladdress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telphone = #{telphone,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT id, userid, province provinceCode, (select name from wh_city where code = a.province) province, city cityCode, (select name from wh_city where code = a.city) city, street streetCode, (select name from wh_city where code = a.street) street, fulladdress, name, telphone FROM wh.wh_shipping_address a WHERE userid = #{userid,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by id
